item.description:
Join TV Diner's Billy Costa At The Greater Merrimack Valley
Restaurant Week Kick Off Party on tuesday Julyy 22nd at the
Mission Oak Room located at the Mission Oak Grill In Newburyport,MA.

Come sample the great dishes from the promotional menus of the restaurant participants for the Greater Merrimack Valley Restaurant Week.

The Restaurant Participants Include:

Athenian Corner,Lowell,MA
Mission Oak Grill,Newburyport,MA
Parker House Grille,Dracut,MA
Cassis French Bistro,Andover,MA
Concord's Colonial Inn,Concord,MA
Dalya's,Bedford,MA
L'Andana Grill,Burlington,MA
Max Stein's,Lexington,MA
Summer Winter,Burlington,MA

The event hours are 6 pm-8 pm. Purchase Tickets On Line
at www.merrimackvalleyrestaurantweek.com!
Click Here To Purchase Tickets Today!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the woman keeping Bill Costa in check
item.name: Greater Merrimack Valley Restaurant Week Kick Of Off Party
